title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form A-5 - Notice to consul general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form A-5 - Notice to consul general

State Regulations
SURROGATE'S COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF ________
________X
ADMINISTRATION PROCEEDING
Estate of ________ NOTICE TO CONSUL
GENERAL
a/k/a
________ Deceased. File No. ________
________X
TO THE CONSUL GENERAL OF ________
AT THE CITY OF NEW YORK
PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that a petition (will
be)(has been) presented to the Surrogate's Court County of ________, on
________, 19________, with respect to the Estate of the above-named decedent
and it appears from the petition that: a. the deceased was a subject of
________or
b. the following distributees are
nonresidents of the United States: Names Addresses Citizenship
____________ ____________
____________
____________ ____________
____________
____________ ____________
____________
____________ ____________
____________
______________
Attorney for Petitioner
______________
Address
________
______________
Telephone No. STATE OF NEW YORK)
) ss.: COUNTY OF ________)
________ being duly sworn, says: That he/she resides at ________, New York; that on the ________, 19________, he/she served a copy of the above NOTICE on
the Consul General of ________ at ________, New York City, by mailing same to
the office of the aforesaid Consul. ______________
Signature

Sworn to before me this
________ day of ________, 19________. _________
Notary Public

Commission Expires: ________
(Affix Stamp or Seal)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form
A-5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
